title: A New Kind of Ranching Is Taking Its Place at the Ponderosa!

subtasks: Drive to the burn unit
Bring hay for the big joe herd
Distribute hay to the big joe herd
Move bison to pasture four
Clean and prepare water sources for bison

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Check the big joe herd. Then they talk about going to the burn unit, bringing hay, feeding the herd, and moving them to different pastures. Each of these steps can be broken down into subtasks. For example, distributing hay would require rolling out hay, which is a physical action. Moving bison would involve guiding them with the feed truck and opening gates, which is another task.
MAINTASK: Check the big joe herd
subtasks: Drive to the burn unit
Bring hay for the big joe herd

Move bison to pasture four
